argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | flimuni.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 | 1 | #P_elflim2 | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) <-> ( ( J e. Top /\ F e. U. ran Fil /\ F C_ ~P X ) /\ ( A e. X /\ ( ( nei ` J ) ` { A } ) C_ F ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simplbi | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> ( J e. Top /\ F e. U. ran Fil /\ F C_ ~P X ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simp2d | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> F e. U. ran Fil ) |
| 5 |  | #P_filunirn | |- ( F e. U. ran Fil <-> F e. ( Fil ` U. F ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylib | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> F e. ( Fil ` U. F ) ) |
| 7 | 3 | #P_simp3d | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> F C_ ~P X ) |
| 8 |  | #P_sspwuni | |- ( F C_ ~P X <-> U. F C_ X ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylib | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> U. F C_ X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_flimneiss | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> ( ( nei ` J ) ` { A } ) C_ F ) |
| 11 |  | #P_flimtop | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_topopn | |- ( J e. Top -> X e. J ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> X e. J ) |
| 14 | 1 | #P_flimelbas | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> A e. X ) |
| 15 |  | #P_opnneip | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ X e. J /\ A e. X ) -> X e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` { A } ) ) |
| 16 | 11, 13, 14, 15 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> X e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` { A } ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 16 | #P_sseldd | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> X e. F ) |
| 18 |  | #P_elssuni | |- ( X e. F -> X C_ U. F ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> X C_ U. F ) |
| 20 | 9, 19 | #P_eqssd | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> U. F = X ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> ( Fil ` U. F ) = ( Fil ` X ) ) |
| 22 | 6, 21 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) -> F e. ( Fil ` X ) ) |
